name: Elegant Black Dress
description: A timeless black dress crafted from luxurious crepe fabric. Perfect for evening events or sophisticated day wear.

name: Silk Blouse
description: Ivory silk blouse with a delicate drape. Ideal for layering or wearing on its own for a refined look.

name: Tailored Trousers
description: High-waisted tailored trousers in a charcoal gray wool blend. Designed for a flattering fit and versatile styling.

name: Cashmere Sweater
description: Soft cashmere sweater in a light beige hue. A luxurious staple for cooler days.

name: Classic Trench Coat
description: Double-breasted trench coat in a neutral sand color. An essential outerwear piece for transitional weather.

name: Leather Tote Bag
description: Structured leather tote bag in black. Perfect for everyday essentials with a touch of elegance.

name: Suede Pumps
description: Classic suede pumps in a deep navy. A versatile footwear option for any sophisticated ensemble.

name: Pearl Earrings
description: Elegant pearl stud earrings. A subtle yet impactful accessory for a polished finish.
